title: What is the best organic alternative treatment for Allergies?
description: Answer (1 of 3): Organic alternative treatment for allergies is nonsensical. Current treatments are organic. When I think organic I think of organic compounds such as arsenic (elemental) and ricin from castor beans. Non-Organic I think of water. What's the organic alternative to water? Most al...
